body_html:
Hi Manjunath!

FYI you might be interested in the following code in contrib, which looks like it does what you want:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/xla_tf_graph/xla_tf_graph_util.h#L62

I don't think I understand the Python / swig-wrapping issues. Perhaps you can open a bug to discuss that further, if the problem still exists with the existing contrib code?

Hi Manjunath!

FYI you might be interested in the following code in contrib, which looks like it does what you want:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/xla_tf_graph/xla_tf_graph_util.h#L62

I don't think I understand the Python / swig-wrapping issues.  Perhaps you can open a bug to discuss that further, if the problem still exists with the existing contrib code?
